ctl:function.name: wcs:get-capabilities-accept-versions
ctl:function.ctl:return: Returns the response from a WCS GetCapabilities request with the AcceptVersions parameter having a value of 1.1.1

ctl:function.name: wcs:describe-coverage-multiple-identifiers
ctl:function.ctl:return: Returns the response from a WCS DescribeCoverage request with multiple coverage identifiers

ctl:function.name: wcs:describe-coverage-minimal-request
ctl:function.ctl:return: Returns the response from a WCS DescribeCoverage minimal request.

ctl:function.name: wcs:describe-coverage-response-interpolation-methods
ctl:function.ctl:return: Returns the response from a WCS DescribeCoverage response with interpolation methods.

ctl:suite.name: wcs:suite
ctl:suite.ctl:title: Web Coverage Service (WCS) 1.1.1
ctl:suite.ctl:description: Validates that a WCS server meets the requirements in the specification.

ctl:test.name: wcs:Main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The Implementation Under Test (IUT) satisfies all applicable assertions. There are 177 tests in total. Depending on the capabilities of the server, some tests are skipped. These are recorded in the detailed results for each type of request.

ctl:form.p: This executable test suite tests the conformance of a WCS 1.1.1 server to the specification OGC 07-067r2 which includes corrigendum 1.

blockquote.p: The URL of the WCS for HTTP GET (KVP) encoding of GetCapabilities.

ctl:message.select: concat('No response from URL: ', $url, '. Perhaps this is not the correct address or the server is down. No tests will be performed.')
concat('WCS 1.1.1 URL is ', $url, '.')

ctl:test.name: wcs:GetCapabilities-main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All assertions for "GetCapabilities" conformance are satisfied.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test driver for the GetCapabilities module.

ctl:code.ctl:comment: From the GetCapabilities, which http methods are supported and what are their URLs

ctl:message.select: concat('The service metadata document version number is ', $version-number, '.')
concat(' ', ' ')
concat('The service metadata document has version ', $version-number, ' but expected to find 1.1.1 as the highest protocol supported. See OGC 06-121r3 subclause 7.3.2.')
concat(' ', ' ')

xsl:if.ctl:message: The server seems to have a problem with handling the GetCapabilities sections parameter. No tests will be performed.

ctl:message.select: concat('The EqualUpdateSequence value is ', $EqualUpdateSequenceValue, '.')
concat('The URL for KVP encoding is ', $url-get, '.')
concat('The URL for XML encoding is ', $url-xml, '.')

xsl:if.ctl:message: No tests using SOAP encoding will be performed. The tests for SOAP encoding are not implemented.

ctl:message.select: concat('sections-supported: ', $sections-supported, '.')
